EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_LA Open House_Q415.Confirmation - Siobhan's talk
EmailTemplate.subject: You're confirmed to attend The Real Meaning of Digital Transformation for Businesses Today
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the upcoming talk with Siobhan McFeeney. Please see event details below.
Date: Wednesday, November 11, 2015 Time: 12:00 - 1:30 PM Location: Pivotal Los Angeles, 1333 2nd Street, Suite 200 Santa Monica, CA 90401
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://pivotal.io>.
